text:
AliExpress and more: the most interesting finds of the day
01 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Anton Martynov

1. AliExpress

2. Tmall

3. Banggood

4. Umka Mall

5. Publishing house "MIF"

6. Asos

7. Promotional codes and discounts




In today's issue, there are discounts on Xiaomi Redmi Note 8, Honor 20 Lite, home appliances, books and other products.
Sign up for the weekly newsletter and get the best finds from AliExpress. And on our Telegram ‚Äë channels ‚ÄúNakhodka‚Äù and ‚ÄúEverything for a Man‚Äù interesting products and selections await you.


AliExpress
Preparations for the grand sale on November 11 continue on AliExpress. Already now you can pick up the goods in the basket. For each product added to the basket, users will receive 5 coins (up to 50 coins per day).
Until November 11, the user can collect a maximum of 700 coins, which during the sale itself must be used to receive discount coupons. You can also collect coupons on the page "Coupon Center". Products of popular brands with discounts and coupons are presented here.
Honor 20 Lite (‚àí15%)



A smartphone with a 6.21-inch display (2,340 √ó 1,080 pixels), a Kirin 710 processor, 4 GB of RAM and 128 GB of ROM. A good choice for watching videos on a large quality screen, surfing the Internet and listening to music.
Draws games at medium and high settings, it is also useful for shooting beautiful photos: on the triple main camera (24 + 8 + 2 megapixels) and front (32 megapixels). The battery capacity is 3,400 mAh. It works on Android 9.0 with the proprietary EMUI 9.0 shell. Supports NFC.
Price: 15 605 ‚Üí 13 305 rubles.

Buy

Yikoda screwdriver (‚àí19%)



Cordless drill / driver in a rugged case with adjustable torque, smooth control of rotation speed and illumination of the working area. The device is protected from overheating and can withstand a drop from a small height.
Price: 1 966 ‚Üí 1 563 rubles.

Buy

Oklick 850ST (‚àí33%)



Wireless keyboard with integrated touchpad. It works within a radius of 10 m. It is best suited for controlling a TV with an operating system or a media center. With its help it is more convenient and faster to carry out all manipulations than with a conventional control panel.
Price: 1 350 ‚Üí 900 rubles.

Buy



Tmall
At Tmall, a big sale will be held on November 11 and 12. In the online store, it will be possible to purchase smartphones and accessories, laptops and office equipment, televisions and audio systems, goods for gamers and household appliances at discounted prices. All attracted suggestions should be added to the basket now.
Vitek VT ‚Äë 2632 BK (‚àí25%)



A non-stick grill press that heats up to 260 ¬∞ C in about 10 minutes. Supports four lid locking positions. With it, you can cook meat, fish or vegetable dishes. Oil will not have to be used.
Price: 3 900 ‚Üí 2 965 rubles.

Buy

Vitek VT ‚Äë 2351 (‚àí27%)



This humidifier can spray water preheated to 80 ¬∞ C, but its temperature itself cannot be changed. Warm steam is useful in the cold season.
In addition, it has a filtration system to protect against deposits and white deposits on walls and furniture. Holds up to 3.5 liters of water, is suitable for rooms with an area of not more than 30 m¬≤.
Price: 1 993 ‚Üí 1 445 rubles.

Buy



Banggood
Banggood will also have a sale from November 10 to 12, where it will be possible to take advantage of discounts on gadgets, tools, electronics and many other products. Postpone your favorite lots in advance so as not to be late with the purchase.
Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 (‚àí15%)



A smartphone with a 6.3-inch display, Snapdragon 665 processor, 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of flash memory. For shooting, a main camera with four sensors (48 + 8 + 2 + 2 MP) and a front camera of 13 MP are installed here. The battery capacity is 4,000 mAh.
Price: 14 532 ‚Üí 12 371 rubles, taking into account delivery according to the BGN8G4G promo code.

Buy

Xiaomi Mi Home Security Camera (‚àí15%)



360 ¬∞ horizontal IP camera, night mode and motion tracking system. Saves video at 1,080p with H.265 encoding. The recording can be viewed from a smartphone or tablet.
Price: 2 767 ‚Üí 1 807 rubles, including delivery by the promotional code BG259D1.

Buy



Umka mall
Umka Mall is selling winter clothes with a 15% discount on the UMKAWARM promo code. Also on the website you can use the UMKAMALL1111 promotional code, which gives a 12% discount on all products with an order amount of 2,990 rubles.
Do not miss the 11.11 sale, which will be held at Umka Mall.
Cubot Power (‚àí15%)



A smartphone with a six-inch display, Helio P23 processor, 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of ROM. The battery capacity is 6,000 mAh.
It takes good photos and videos, copes with most games and will be a great choice for surfing the Internet, watching videos on YouTube and chatting on social networks.
Price: 16 502 ‚Üí 14 126 rubles.

Buy

Xiaomi Deerma HX20 (‚àí16%)



A shoe and sock dryer eliminates bad breath and kills bacteria. Able to work on a timer simultaneously with two pairs of shoes.
Price: 3 190 ‚Üí 2 693 rubles.

Buy



MIF Publishing House
‚ÄúDesign of familiar things‚Äù, Donald Norman (‚àí20%)




Updated principles for effective design.

Donald Norman in his book examines common user errors and offers designers various ways to prevent them.
The author gives the fundamental principles that must be followed in order to turn things that are familiar to us into objects that give pleasure and bring joy.
Price: 1 210 ‚Üí 968 rubles.

Buy

Everest, Sangma Francis and Lisk Fang (‚àí20%)




About one of the most famous, beautiful and dangerous mountains on Earth.

The book contains interesting facts, stories and legends about Everest. Young readers will be interested to know where this peak is located, when it formed, who was the first to climb it, what animals and plants live on its slopes, and why it is one of the most beautiful and dangerous places on Earth.
Price: 884 ‚Üí 707 rubles.

Buy

‚ÄúSilence him,‚Äù Danny Gregory (‚àí20%)




How to defeat an internal critic and take action.

The inner voice often prevents us from creating something worthwhile: we are afraid of mistakes and possible humiliation. Danny Gregory, using a personal example in this book, explains how to deal with the critic who sits in each of us.
‚ÄúSilence him‚Äù will help you become bolder and inspire creative work.
Price: 884 ‚Üí 707 rubles.

Buy



Asos
Shopper bag from Asos Design (‚àí20%)



A leather bag with rings, silver fittings, a magnetic closure and an inside pocket without a closure.
Price: 2 990 ‚Üí 2 390 rubles.

Buy

Pimkie Round Bag (‚àí25%)



Small shoulder bag with zipper and adjustable strap.
Price: 1,190 ‚Üí 890 rubles.

Buy



Promotion codes and discounts
1. Oldi - before the 5th of November the action ‚ÄúScare the Witch!‚Äù Takes place. You can get a discount from 300 to 1,500 rubles by turning the insurance meter.
2. Xiaomi - in honor of Halloween, discounts of up to 5,000 rubles and gifts.
3. Shein - 15% discount when ordering from 3 990 rubles with the FNV15 promotional code.
4. Bestwatch - 15% discount on everything with the FWAD15 promotional code.
5. TomTop - 5% discount on smartphones using the PICODI5PHONE promo code.
6. LitRes - in honor of Halloween, they give a book and a cashback of 10% until November 4 for purchases from 299 rubles.

Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.
